description:
Knitted from the finest Merino wool so that it does not itch or scratch.The jersey is best suited as a first layer on cold days. The raglan cut sleeve and flat seams enhance comfort while wearing. The outstanding properties of Merino wool guarantee that the jersey remains free of any odour, even after it is worn for a long time.

Why choose PURE naturals®? Ethical merino ranching in Australia, textile processing by world-famous Schoeller, just down the road from our modern manufacturing partner. 100% superfine (16 micron) merino apparel, made in Europe to our minimal-impact specs. Embrace the PURE naturals® life with sustainable fibers.
name: PURE naturals PURE Tree 100% Merino Wool LS T-Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 100% Australian Merino wool jersey (16.5 microns,160 g)
